ygData.subject: 2 more pet questions
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Is the only way to make a pet attack to click on the pet and then say kill a large rat because I would like to select the creature that I want him to
ygData.messageBody:
1)
Is the only way to make a pet attack to click on the pet and then say "kill a large rat"
because I would like to select the creature that I want him to attack and say PET KILL or PET ATTACK and that did not work.

2) I saw some necromancer in Unrest and he had this skeleton w/ him and the skeleton would fall into a pile of bones after saying something like "Taking new form master" Then later the pile of bones would float back into a full skeleton. HOW WAS HE DOING THAT????


Thanks! :-)
